description:
Sousuke’s team struggles to escape, but the path to freedom is blocked by someone from Sagara’s past who seems to be able to predict their every move.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Bate vânt spre casă partea a II-a
Il vento che danza in patria - Parte centrale
Le vent souffle à la maison (2)
Mit dem Wind in die Heimat, Teil 2
The Wind Blows at Home, Part 2
Ветер, гуляющий по моей Родине. Часть 2
